title: White Noise 2: The Light
occurrences: You saw a white light that engulfed you, almost seemed to beckon you to stay.
As many as eight out of ten people who've had an NDE report seeing a white light.
- Freaky, huh? - What about the light I'm seeing now?
Precognition, the light you're seeing, all that is part of supernatural white noise.
It draws your attention to the white light.
When you see the light, you think it means... What do you think it means?
With the woman, it could be hours, just depending on how strong the light is.
EVP, the white light, precognition, all that kind of stuff.
"Lucifer - from the Latin meaning giver of light."
Terrible things happen on the third day after using the light to save somebody.
